tool.name: Filter Stats
tool.description: Identify number of positions excluded based on filtered status
tool.help:
What it does ============
This script prints a stat summary of the number of N's and -'s found in the SNV-alignment positions tab delimited file.
Usage =====
**Parameters** - input - The SNV-alignment positions tab delimited file
**Options** - -all When this option is set, the summary will include all the entries marked as 'filtered-invalid'
